subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In three postseason appearances as the wild card, the Yankees lost in the first round. But they are 9-2 against the Twins in the post season, including a first-round sweep last year.
snippet: In three postseason appearances as the wild card, the Yankees lost in the first round. But they are 9-2 against the Twins in the post season, including a first-round sweep last year.
